original_text:
Monkey’s Gold
Sei pronto a scrivere la storia entrando nella giungla per guadagnare una lunga serie di premi interessanti? Monkey’s Gold è la scelta giusta: la slot online è stata firmata da Nolimit City e sfrutta una meccanica particolare che merita di essere scoperta e provata. Ogni volta che il giocatore realizza una combinazione vincente i simboli restano in gioco e vengono spostati verso la parte bassa della griglia man mano che le altre caselle della griglia si liberano. Praticamente è una sorta di Tetris selvaggio, che ti porterà ad aumentare le combinazioni vincenti tenendo solo le icone fortunate. La griglia continuerà a girare fino a quando non avrai completato gli accoppiamenti. Se hai un po’ di fortuna potresti anche trovare i simboli 2×2 o 3×3 che fungono da moltiplicatori per far svettare alle stelle le tue vincite appena realizzate nel giro. Ma questo è solo l’inizio di un’avventura nella giungla che merita di essere provata e raccontata.
Grafica e simboli di gioco
A livello estetico ciò che è stato fatto dalla casa di produzione Nolimit City è decisamente sorprendente. Il design di Monkey’s Gold si basa su un tema accattivante che ci porta a vivere nella giunga. Qui troviamo anche il suo Re, una Scimmia che viene realizzata con uno stile simil asiatico. Lo sfondo è ricco di dettagli, le immagini e i simboli sono realizzati con un’esplosione di colori che rendono ancora più entusiasmante l’esperienza del gameplay. Ad accompagnare ogni giro vi è una colonna sonora ben riuscita che serve per scandire l’atterraggio delle icone sulla griglia di gioco. L’Atmosfera è interessante e non delude minimamente le nostre aspettative. Ai lati della griglia troviamo due strepitose statue di scimmie di pietra che si pongono poco prima dell’inizio della vegetazione. Ma vediamo che cosa ci offre in termini di funzionalità aggiuntive.
La funzione Monkey’s Gold Free Spins ti aiuta a far crescere il valore della scommessa con ogni riga riempita. Potrai continuare a giocare cercando di creare delle combo vincenti composte da 3 o più simboli, con o senza l’aiuto del Jolly. Alla fine puoi vincere un premio massimo pari a 12.683 volte la tua scommessa. Non male, soprattutto se consideriamo anche il suo RTP fissato al 96,02%, che è nella media del settore di gioco online.
Ma il pezzo forte è la funzione xPays di cui abbiamo parlato poco fa: permette di rimuovere i simboli perdenti per lasciare spazio solo a quelli vincenti. E il processo si ripete per ogni volta che ottieni una nuova combo. A quel punto otterrai un pagamento con tutti i blocchi di simboli che sono rimasti sulla griglia. E non dimenticarti dei Free Spins che puoi ottenere se posizioni 3 simboli Bonus sulla griglia e potrai così giocare con 10 giri free che crescono per ogni bonus che posizioni.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot Monkey’s Gold
Monkey’s Gold ha un gameplay assolutamente ben riuscito grazie alla meccanica xPays che è una trovata geniale per rendere ancora più appagante l’esperienza di gioco. Può sembrarti complicato all’inizio ma imparerai sin dai primi giri ad amarla e non potrai più farne a meno. Provare per credere!

raw_translation.response:
Are you ready to make history by entering the jungle and winning a series of interesting prizes? Look no further than Monkey's Gold, an online slot game by Nolimit City with a unique mechanic that is worth exploring and trying out. Each time a winning combination is made, the symbols remain in play and are moved towards the bottom of the grid as other grid squares are cleared. Essentially, it's a wild version of Tetris that will increase your winning combinations by keeping only the lucky icons. The grid will continue to spin until all matches are completed. If you're lucky, you may even find 2x2 or 3x3 symbols that act as multipliers to skyrocket your winnings in one round. But this is just the beginning of an adventure in the jungle that is worth experiencing and telling.

In terms of aesthetics, the production company Nolimit City has done an outstanding job. The design of Monkey's Gold is based on a captivating theme that takes us to the jungle. Here we also find its king, a Monkey created in a similar Asian style. The background is rich in detail, and images and symbols are bursting with colors that make the gameplay experience even more exciting. Accompanying each spin is a well-executed soundtrack that serves to mark the landing of icons on the game grid. The atmosphere is interesting and does not disappoint our expectations.

The Monkey's Gold Free Spins feature helps increase the value of your bet with each filled line. You can continue to play by trying to create winning combos composed of 3 or more symbols, with or without the help of the Wild. Eventually, you can receive a maximum prize equivalent to 12,683 times your bet. Not bad, especially when considering its RTP, which is fixed at 96.02%, which is in line with the online gaming industry.

But the highlight is the xPays function mentioned earlier: it allows you to remove losing symbols to make room for only winning ones. The process repeats itself each time you achieve a new combo. At that point, you will receive a payment with all the remaining symbol blocks on the grid. And don't forget the Free Spins you can get if you position 3 Bonus symbols on the grid, allowing you to play 10 free spins that increase every time you position a bonus.

In conclusion, Monkey's Gold has a gameplay that is perfectly executed thanks to the xPays mechanic, which is a brilliant idea to make the gaming experience even more rewarding. It may seem complicated at first, but you will learn to love it from the first spins and you won't be able to get enough of it. Try it to believe it!

raw_translation.response:
Monkey's Gold

Are you ready to write history by entering the jungle and earning a long series of exciting prizes? Then Monkey's Gold is the right choice for you! This online slot was created by Nolimit City and features a unique gameplay mechanism that is worth discovering and trying out. Every time a player achieves a winning combination, the symbols remain on the game board and are moved towards the bottom as other spaces on the board become empty. It's like a wild version of Tetris that leads you to increase your winning combinations by only keeping the lucky icons. The board will continue spinning until you've completed all the matches. With a bit of luck, you might also come across 2x2 or 3x3 symbols that act as multipliers to skyrocket your winnings on the very same spin. But this is just the beginning of an adventure in the jungle that deserves to be experienced and narrated.

Graphics and Gaming Symbols

Nolimit City has done an amazing job with the aesthetics of Monkey's Gold. The design is based on an engaging theme that transports you to the jungle, where you'll find the game's king - a Monkey created in a similar style to Asian art. The background is rich with details, and the images and symbols are bursting with color, making the gameplay experience even more exciting. Each spin is accompanied by a successful soundtrack that marks the landing of the icons on the game board. The atmosphere is captivating and won't disappoint even the most experienced gamblers. On the sides of the board, you'll find two stunning stone monkey statues that stand just before the vegetation. But let's look at the game's extra features.

The Monkey's Gold Free Spins feature helps you increase your bet value with each filled row. You can continue to play by trying to create winning combos composed of 3 or more symbols, with or without the help of the wild. Eventually, you can win a maximum prize of up to 12,683 times your bet. Not bad, especially when considering the game's 96.02% RTP, which is in line with the online gaming industry's average.

But the real highlight is the xPays feature we discussed earlier. It allows you to remove losing symbols to make room for only the winning ones. The process is repeated each time you obtain a new combo. Then, you'll get a payout with all the symbol blocks left on the board. Don't forget the Free Spins that you can win by landing 3 Bonus symbols on the board, allowing you to play with 10 free spins that increase with each bonus spin you land.

Final Thoughts on Monkey's Gold Slot

Monkey's Gold has an excellently-crafted gameplay mechanism thanks to the xPays feature, which is a clever move to make the gaming experience even more satisfying. It may seem complicated at first, but you'll learn to love it from the very first spins, and you won't be able to get enough of it. Try it out and see for yourself!

Review: Monkey's Gold

Are you ready to write history by entering the jungle and earning a long series of exciting prizes? Then Monkey's Gold is the right choice for you! This online slot was created by Nolimit City and features a unique gameplay mechanism that is worth discovering and trying out. Every time a player achieves a winning combination, the symbols remain on the game board and are moved towards the bottom as other spaces on the board become empty. It's like a wild version of Tetris that leads you to increase your winning combinations by only keeping the lucky icons. The board will continue spinning until you've completed all the matches. With a bit of luck, you might also come across 2x2 or 3x3 symbols that act as multipliers to skyrocket your winnings on the very same spin. But this is just the beginning of an adventure in the jungle that deserves to be experienced and narrated.

Graphics and Gaming Symbols

Nolimit City has done an amazing job with the aesthetics of Monkey's Gold. The design is based on an engaging theme that transports you to the jungle, where you'll find the game's king - a Monkey created in a similar style to Asian art. The background is rich with details, and the images and symbols are bursting with color, making the gameplay experience even more exciting. Each spin is accompanied by a successful soundtrack that marks the landing of the icons on the game board. The atmosphere is captivating and won't disappoint even the most experienced gamblers. On the sides of the board, you'll find two stunning stone monkey statues that stand just before the vegetation. But let's look at the game's extra features.

The Monkey's Gold Free Spins feature helps you increase your bet value with each filled row. You can continue to play by trying to create winning combos composed of 3 or more symbols, with or without the help of the wild. Eventually, you can win a maximum prize of up to 12,683 times your bet. Not bad, especially when considering the game's 96.02% RTP, which is in line with the online gaming industry's average.

But the real highlight is the xPays feature we discussed earlier. It allows you to remove losing symbols to make room for only the winning ones. The process is repeated each time you obtain a new combo. Then, you'll get a payout with all the symbol blocks left on the board. Don't forget the Free Spins that you can win by landing 3 Bonus symbols on the board, allowing you to play with 10 free spins that increase with each bonus spin you land.

Final Thoughts on Monkey's Gold Slot

Monkey's Gold has an excellently-crafted gameplay mechanism thanks to the xPays feature, which is a clever move to make the gaming experience even more satisfying. It may seem complicated at first, but you'll learn to love it from the very first spins, and you won't be able to get enough of it. Try it out and see for yourself!

The xPays feature allows you to remove losing symbols to make room for only the winning ones, increasing the chances of achieving a winning combination. The process is repeated after every spin when a new combo is obtained, and you'll receive a payout with all the symbol blocks left on the board.

Winning potential

Monkey's Gold has an RTP of 96.02%, which is in line with the industry average. With a maximum payout potential of 12,683 times your bet, the winning potential of Monkey's Gold is impressive. The game's xPays feature effectively increases your chances of winning, making the game even more exciting for players.

Review: Monkey's Gold

Are you ready to write history by entering the jungle and earning a long series of exciting prizes? Then Monkey's Gold is the right choice for you! This online slot was created by Nolimit City and features a unique gameplay mechanism that is worth discovering and trying out. Every time a player achieves a winning combination, the symbols remain on the game board and are moved towards the bottom as other spaces on the board become empty. It's like a wild version of Tetris that leads you to increase your winning combinations by only keeping the lucky icons. The board will continue spinning until you've completed all the matches. With a bit of luck, you might also come across 2x2 or 3x3 symbols that act as multipliers to skyrocket your winnings on the very same spin. But this is just the beginning of an adventure in the jungle that deserves to be experienced and narrated.

Graphics and Gaming Symbols

Nolimit City has done an amazing job with the aesthetics of Monkey's Gold. The design is based on an engaging theme that transports you to the jungle, where you'll find the game's king - a Monkey created in a similar style to Asian art. The background is rich with details, and the images and symbols are bursting with color, making the gameplay experience even more exciting. Each spin is accompanied by a successful soundtrack that marks the landing of the icons on the game board. The atmosphere is captivating and won't disappoint even the most experienced gamblers. On the sides of the board, you'll find two stunning stone monkey statues that stand just before the vegetation. But let's look at the game's extra features.

The Monkey's Gold Free Spins feature helps you increase your bet value with each filled row. You can continue to play by trying to create winning combos composed of 3 or more symbols, with or without the help of the wild. Eventually, you can win a maximum prize of up to 12,683 times your bet. Not bad, especially when considering the game's 96.02% RTP, which is in line with the online gaming industry's average.

But the real highlight is the xPays feature we discussed earlier. It allows you to remove losing symbols to make room for only the winning ones. The process is repeated each time you obtain a new combo. Then, you'll get a payout with all the symbol blocks left on the board. Don't forget the Free Spins that you can win by landing 3 Bonus symbols on the board, allowing you to play with 10 free spins that increase with each bonus spin you land.

Final Thoughts on Monkey's Gold Slot

Monkey's Gold has an excellently-crafted gameplay mechanism thanks to the xPays feature, which is a clever move to make the gaming experience even more satisfying. It may seem complicated at first, but you'll learn to love it from the very first spins, and you won't be able to get enough of it. Try it out and see for yourself!
